column5: Enjoy the perfect getaway on the North Shores of Lake Travis in Lago Vista. This 3-bedroom, 2-bath home sleeps 8-10 and comes furnished and equipped to please with HD TV, DVD and Wi-Fi. With lakefront access you're steps away from fishing, paddle boarding, or taking a peddle boat around the secluded cove. Plan a family picnic at the private access park. Enjoy the scenic views from one of 3 multi-level decks, or take in the fabulous Texas sunset from the lakeside patio and fireplace.
